{{n5-section-special-skills}}


Troopers with this CC Special Skill go into combat with an escort unit.

{{css_skillbox |black| GUARD | AUTOMATIC SKILL }}
{{skill-label | Optional }}
{{requirements}}
* The target of the [[CC Attack]] must be in [[LoF]] and [[ZoC]].
{{effects}}
* Allows the user to perform a CC Attack but with no need to reach or be in [[Silhouette contact]] with the target.
* Both the user and the target can perform Skills and apply MODs and CC Special Skills that require Silhouette Contact. For example: they can apply [[Martial Arts]], [[Natural Born Warrior]], [[D-Charges]], or the [[Close Combat with Multiple Troopers | +1B MOD for each Allied Trooper engaged in CC]].
{{css_skillbox-end}}


{{see-also-start}}
{{important-start}}
'''Aerial and Guard:'''<br>
{{update | PDF 5.2, October 2025}}
{{erratahighlight}}The [[Guard]] Special Skill may not be used against Troopers with the [[Aerial]] Skill, unless they are in [[Unconscious]] State.{{erratahighlight-end}}
{{update-end}}
{{original}}
{{originalhighlight}}While this Skill is active, the [[Guard]] Special Skill may not be used against the Trooper.{{originalhighlight-end}}
{{original-end}} 
{{important-end}}
{{see-also-end}}
